docs.title: Pioneering Trading Intelligence with AI Precision
docs.text: Welcome to the AI for Trading Handbook, a comprehensive knowledge base developed by Tauric Research. This handbook serves as a detailed guide to understanding and implementing AI and Machine Learning in trading and quantitative finance.

docs.title: About This Handbook
docs.text:
This handbook is designed to provide both theoretical foundations and practical insights into the intersection of artificial intelligence and trading. Whether you're a researcher, developer, or trading professional, you'll find valuable resources covering:

  • Market foundations and structure
  • Various asset classes and their characteristics
  • Quantitative finance principles
  • Trading strategies and their implementation
  • AI/ML applications in trading
  • Large Language Models in financial markets
  • Industry landscape and best practices

docs.title: Why AI for Trading?
docs.text:
The financial markets are increasingly driven by technology and data. AI and Machine Learning have become essential tools for:

  • Processing vast amounts of market data
  • Identifying complex patterns and relationships
  • Making data-driven trading decisions
  • Managing risk and optimizing portfolios
  • Automating trading strategies
  • Enhancing market analysis and prediction

docs.title: Handbook Structure
docs.text:
The content is organized into several main sections:

  1. Market Foundations: Understanding the basics of financial markets
  2. Asset Classes: Deep dive into different types of financial instruments
  3. Quantitative Finance: Mathematical and statistical foundations
  4. Trading Strategies: Various approaches to market participation
  5. AI for Trading: Machine Learning applications in trading
  6. LLM Trading: Large Language Models in financial markets
  7. Industry Landscape: Overview of market participants and practices

docs.text:
To begin your journey, we recommend starting with:

  • Market Foundations - For understanding basic market concepts
  • AI/ML Concepts - For learning about AI fundamentals
  • Trading Strategies - For exploring different trading approaches
